name: TexasTribuneBrief
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: The Texas Tribune Brief helps you stay on top of political and policy news by highlighting the most important stories. Hosted by Alana Rocha, with reporting help from The Texas Tribune staff, the Rundown gets you up to speed on issues of statewide impact. Available by 6am CT weekdays.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
